title: start
sample_text:
1
Accidental Damage
UIN: IRDAN125RP0003V01202021/A0017V01202223
In consideration of payment of additional premium the policy 
is extended to cover direct physical loss or damage to the 
property described in the Policy Schedule whilst situated 
in the insured premises due to accident from any fortuitous 
cause including accidental discharge, leakage, or overflow 
of water or steam from plumbing, septic tanks and cylinders, 
stand pipes for fire hose, industrial and domestic appliances, 
refrigerating system, air-conditioning system, rain (or snow) 
admitted through defective roof, headers spou
